function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"COVID-19 pandemic impacting health and safety of construction workers","Impact":"Risk of illness, reduced workforce, and potential project delays","Mitigation":"Enforcing strict health and safety protocols, providing proper PPE, and facilitating remote work where possible","Technologies":"Health monitoring devices, contact tracing apps, and virtual collaboration tools","People":"Construction workers, operators, engineers, fabricators, project managers","Owner":"Construction companies, project managers, government agencies"},{"Description":"Threat of virus spread due to construction activities","Impact":"Risk of community transmission, public health concerns, and negative public perception","Mitigation":"Implementing strict hygiene protocols, regular testing, and vaccination programs","Technologies":"Sanitation equipment, rapid testing kits, and vaccination management systems","People":"General public, construction workers, local communities","Owner":"Construction companies, local government, public health agencies"},{"Description":"Impact of weather-related natural disasters on construction operations","Impact":"Risk of project delays, infrastructure damage, and increased safety hazards","Mitigation":"Implementing disaster-resilient construction practices, early warning systems, and emergency response plans","Technologies":"Weather monitoring tools, building materials with high resilience, and emergency communication systems","People":"Construction workers, project managers, local communities","Owner":"Construction companies, project managers, local government"}]}
